text: Apologies for the delay in restoring power due to the #powercut. We've got most supplies back on in #BA5 #Wells, but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 01:30  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #Wells #BA5 and surrounding areas. We aim to restore all supplies by 23:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
All supplies to #Coleford #Gloucester #GL16 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #NG9 #Nottingham area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #NG9 #Nottingham area. We aim to restore all supplies by 20:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
All customers affected by the #powercut in #NN7 #Horton #Northampton now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Horton #Northampton #NN7 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 18:30.  Siân
There is currently a #powercut in #GL16 #Coleford #Gloucester surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 18:30.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #EX6 #Exminster surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by time. 12:00 Ian
Apologies for the #powercut in #Ferndale #CF43 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 06:00. Ellie
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Stroud #GL5 #GL6 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 04:30. Ellie
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Stroud #GL5 #GL6 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 03:40. Ellie
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #GwaelodYGarth  #CF15 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Ellie
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in #GwaelodYGarth #CF15 area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 01:00. Ellie
All supplies to #StColumb #TR8 #9 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Torrington #EX38 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #CF64 #Penarth now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #CF64 Penarth area. We aim to restore all supplies by 21:30.  Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #StColumb #TR8 #TR9 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 19:30. Andi

Apologies for the delay in restoring power due to the #powercut  We've got most supplies back on in #Torrington #EX38, but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 19:30.  Siân.
